definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: A software company might give bonuses to programmers who create the fewest bugs .
sentences.chinese: 一个软件公司可以加发奖励给写出最少臭虫的程序员。

sentences.english: We're finding that businesses who have bedbugs oftentimes will close to remediate the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，经常闹臭虫的企业得歇业来处理这个问题。

sentences.english: Bedbug bites do not usually require treatment.
sentences.chinese: 臭虫叮咬通常不需要治疗。

sentences.english: We were often vexed by bedbugs.
"What do people catch in the Queensborough Bridge—bug?" asked Wilbur.
sentences.chinese: “人们用它来抓什么？臭虫吗？”威尔伯问。

sentences.english: The bug still wasn't dead, so he stepped on it again.
sentences.chinese: 臭虫还没死，所以他又踩了一脚。

sentences.english: The stink bug population has been exploding this year.
sentences.chinese: 此类臭虫数量增长今年呈爆炸势态。

sentences.english: There may be robot bedbugs in their bed.
sentences.chinese: 他们的床上也可能放置了机器人臭虫。

sentences.english: A software company might give bonuses to programmers who create the fewest bugs.
sentences.chinese: 一个软体公司可以加发奖励给写出最少臭虫的程式员。

sentences.english: Fixed a bug where Monster Shrines could affect Druid Vines.
sentences.chinese: 固定一巨大的圣地能影响德鲁伊特藤蔓植物的臭虫。

sentences.english: The big black bear bit back the big black bug .
sentences.chinese: 大黑熊反过来咬了那只大黑臭虫。

sentences.english: The smuggler shrugged to the bugler hugging the bug in the tugboat.
sentences.chinese: 私运者对在拖船中拥抱臭虫的号手耸耸肩。

sentences.english: The big black bug bled blue black blood.
sentences.chinese: 大黑臭虫流出的血是深黑色的。

sentences.english: Fixed bug when rats nest appears under water.
sentences.chinese: 当大鼠窝出现在水下时，固定的臭虫。

sentences.english: In this chapter, you'll learn about the history of software bugs and software testing.
sentences.chinese: 在这一章你将学到软件测试臭虫与软件的历史。

sentences.english: Stinkbugs often lay their eggs in clumps.

definition: woodlouse (suborder Oniscidea within the order Isopoda)/a.k.a. roly-poly, pill bug, sow bug etc
a slug/sb with a runny nose
